title: Jepsen, Derulo Chat About Their Travel Habits
content:
After performing at the MTV World Stage Malaysia event in Kuala Lumpur, pop stars Carly Rae Jepsen and Jason Derulo talk about their love of travel and exotic foods. (Sept. 21) Subscribe for more Breaking News: http://bit.ly/1H6eKjp
